entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 13 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
